channel.title: iphone on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in iphone on Just a Memo

item.title: iTunes
item.description: Change iTunes Backup directory Default backup directory Move to “J:\My iPhone Backup\Backup”, Just create a softlink mklink /J “%APPDATA%\Apple Computer\MobileSync\Backup” “J:\My iPhone Backup\Backup”

item.title: IPHONE linux backup
item.description: Connect to linux sudo emerge -avq app-pda/ifuse sudo emerge -avq app-pda/usbmuxdsuod usbmuxd -f -vsudo idevicepair pair Backup whole iphone idevicebackup -i backup --full backupdir Mount / umount setup /etc/fuse.conf ifuse 定义的目录就是 /media/iPhone, 这是一个固定名称目录 user_allow_other mkdir /media/iPhone make /media/iPhone chmod 777 /media/iPhone/ Mount iphone ifuse /media/iPhone --root Umount iphone 普通用户即可 fusermount
